c1.name: Dance of the Waning Moon
c1.descriptionRaw:
<color=#FFD780FF>Dance of Haftkarsvar</color> will be enhanced as follows:
路Luminous Illusion DMG is increased by 65%.
路The Tranquility Aura's duration is extended by 6s.
c1.description:
Dance of Haftkarsvar will be enhanced as follows:
路Luminous Illusion DMG is increased by 65%.
路The Tranquility Aura's duration is extended by 6s.

c2.name: The Starry Skies Their Flowers Rain
c2.descriptionRaw:
After characters affected by the Golden Chalice's Bounty deal <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color> to an opponent, that opponent's <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro RES</color> will be decreased by 35% for 10s. After a triggered Bloom reaction deals DMG to opponents, their <color=#99FF88FF>Dendro RES</color> will be decreased by 35% for 10s.
You need to have unlocked the "Court of Dancing Petals" Talent.
c2.description:
After characters affected by the Golden Chalice's Bounty deal Hydro DMG to an opponent, that opponent's Hydro RES will be decreased by 35% for 10s. After a triggered Bloom reaction deals DMG to opponents, their Dendro RES will be decreased by 35% for 10s.
You need to have unlocked the "Court of Dancing Petals" Talent.

c3.name: Beguiling Shadowstep
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Dance of Abzendegi: Distant Dreams, Listening Spring</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Dance of Abzendegi: Distant Dreams, Listening Spring by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Fricative Pulse
c4.descriptionRaw: After the third dance step of <color=#FFD780FF>Dance of Haftkarsvar</color>'s Pirouette hits opponents, Nilou will gain 15 Elemental Energy, and DMG from her <color=#FFD780FF>Dance of Abzendegi: Distant Dreams, Listening Spring</color> will be increased by 50% for 8s.
c4.description: After the third dance step of Dance of Haftkarsvar's Pirouette hits opponents, Nilou will gain 15 Elemental Energy, and DMG from her Dance of Abzendegi: Distant Dreams, Listening Spring will be increased by 50% for 8s.

c5.name: Twirling Light
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Dance of Haftkarsvar</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Dance of Haftkarsvar by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Frostbreaker's Melody
c6.descriptionRaw:
For every 1,000 points of Max HP, Nilou's CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG will increase by 0.6% and 1.2% respectively.
The maximum increase in CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG via this method is 30% and 60% respectively.
